inkball

类 Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • inkball.Tile

  • public class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
    The Tile class represents a tile on the game board. It handles tile properties such as position, type, and interactions with balls.

    • 字段概要

      限定符和类型 字段和说明

      protected processing.core.PImage image

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Tile

        public Tile(int x,
            int y,
            java.lang.String type)
        Constructor for the Tile class. Initializes the tile's position and type.
        参数:
        x - The x-coordinate of the tile.
        y - The y-coordinate of the tile.
        type - The type of the tile.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setImage

        public void setImage(processing.core.PImage img)
        Sets the image for the tile.
        参数:
        img - The image to be set for the tile.

      • getImage

        public processing.core.PImage getImage()
        Gets the image of the tile.
        返回:
        The current image of the tile.

      • draw

        public void draw(App app)
        Draws the tile on the App.
        参数:
        app - The main application to draw to.

      • getX

        public int getX()
        Gets the x-coordinate of the tile.
        返回:
        The x-coordinate.

      • getY

        public int getY()
        Gets the y-coordinate of the tile.
        返回:
        The y-coordinate.

      • getType

        public java.lang.String getType()
        Gets the type of the tile.
        返回:
        The type as a string.

      • isHole

        public boolean isHole()
        Checks if the tile is a hole.
        返回:
        True if the tile is a hole, false otherwise.

      • getHoleCenter

        protected Vec getHoleCenter()
        Gets the center position of the hole if the tile is a hole.
        返回:
        A Vec representing the hole's center, or null if not a hole.

      • isOverLap

        public boolean isOverLap(Ball ball)
        Checks if the ball overlaps with the tile.
        参数:
        ball - The ball to check for overlap.
        返回:
        True if the ball overlaps with the tile, false otherwise.

      • checkCollision

        public void checkCollision(Ball ball)
        Checks for collision between the ball and the tile. Adjusts the ball's position and direction upon collision.
        参数:
        ball - The ball involved in the collision.

      • attractBall

        public java.lang.String attractBall(Ball ball)
        Attracts the ball towards the hole if it is within range.
        参数:
        ball - The ball to be attracted.
        返回:
        The type of the tile if the ball is captured, null otherwise.

      • hitTile

        public void hitTile(Ball ball,
                    App app)
        Handles the interaction when a ball hits the tile. Increments the hit counter and changes the tile image based on hits.
        参数:
        ball - The ball interacting with the tile.
        app - The main application instance used for image retrieval.

      • setYellowPosition

        public void setYellowPosition(int x,
                              int y,
                              App app)
        Sets the position of the tile and updates its image for yellow tiles.
        参数:
        x - The new x-coordinate of the tile.
        y - The new y-coordinate of the tile.
        app - The main application instance used for image retrieval.

      • setOldPosition

        public void setOldPosition()
        Marks the tile as an "old" position.
